strapiPost.title: Fayetteville-Based NFT Platform Raises Nearly $1M In Funding
strapiPost.content:
A Fayetteville-based NFT platform for developers and traders raised nearly $1 million in a pre-seed funding round led by Hivemind.

  • Bridging gaps: The platform is called Byzantion, and the Company is building a unified, cross-chain experience for both developers and traders. Byzantion will be set apart by offering easy to use infrastructure for developers to build on top of and tools for serious NFT traders.
  • Unique space: Byzantion currently provides trading tools to research, buy and list over 600,000 NFTs on Stacks. Additionally, the Company has APIs, community tooling, and more on both the Stacks and NEAR protocols for developers to build NFT analytics tools, white label marketplaces and more on top of.

Learn more HERE.
